data.markdown:
# Sign in

to continue to Google Forms

Email or phone

Forgot email?

Type the text you hear or see

Not your computer? Use Guest mode to sign in privately. [Learn more about using Guest mode](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/6130773?hl=en-US)

Next

Create account

- For my personal use
- For my child
- For work or my business

primary.reasoning: The button has a vibrant blue background (#0B57D0) which is consistent with the brand color and is action-oriented with the text 'Next'. This makes it the primary CTA.

secondary.reasoning: There are no other buttons with a different background color to classify as secondary. All buttons are in the same color group as the primary button.

personality.targetAudience: general users, likely for forms and surveys

metadata.description: Access Google Forms with a personal Google account or Google Workspace account (for business use).
metadata.title: Google Forms: Sign-in

survey_basics.title: Sign in to Google Forms
survey_basics.description: Sign in using your email or phone number to access Google Forms.

sections.section_description: Enter your email or phone number to sign in.

ux_best_practices.description: Provide clear instructions for users to follow during the sign-in process.
ux_best_practices.implementation: Use simple language and guide users through the steps.

ux_best_practices.description: Ensure the sign-in page is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.
ux_best_practices.implementation: Use proper HTML tags and ARIA roles.

ui_design_patterns.button_styles: Rounded corners, primary color for action buttons
